record.title: SUPPORTING THE MISSION AND GOALS OF NATIONAL CRIME VICTIMS' RIGHTS WEEK
record.chair: The unfinished business is the vote on the motion to suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, H. Res. 119, on which the yeas and nays were ordered.
record.narrative: The Clerk read the title of the resolution.
record.chair: The question is on the motion offered by the gentleman from Virginia (Mr. Scott) that the House suspend the rules and agree to the resolution, H. Res. 119.

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, during the vote on rollcall 252, I was momentarily detained, and was not on the House floor. Had I been present and voting, I would have voted "yea."
